pages.text: aur Allah ta’ala ki raah ke shahido ko murda math kaho, wo zinda hai, lekin tum nahi jaante
aur hum kisi na kisi tarah tumhaari azmaayesh zaroor karenge, dushman ke darr se, bhook pyaas se, maal wa jaan aur phalo ki kami se aur un sabr karne waalo ko khush qabri de di jiye
jinhe jab kabhi koyi musibath atai hai to keh diya karte hai ke hum to khud Allah ta’ala ki milkiyath hai aur hum osi ki taraf lautne wale hai
un par un ke rab ki nawaazishe aur rehmate hai aur yahi log hidaayath yaafta hai

safa aur marwa Allah ta’ala ki nishaniyo mein se hai, is liye baitullah ka haj wa umraah karne waale par un ka tawaaf kar lene mein bhi koyi gunah nahi, apni khushi se bhalaayi karne waalo ka Allah qadardaan hai, aur unhe qoob jaanne wala hai

jo log hamaari utari hoyi dalilo aur hidaayath ko chipaate hai, ba-wajoodh ye ke hum ose apni kitaab mein logo ke liye bayan kar chuke hai, un logo par Allah ki aur tamaam laanath karne waalo ki laanath hai
magar wo log jo tauba karle aur islaah karle aur bayaan karde, to main un ki tauba qubool kar leta hoon aur main tauba qubool karne wala aur rahem wa karam karne waala hoon
yaqinan jo kuffaar apne kufr mein hee mar jaaye un par Allah ta’ala ki, farishto ki aur tamaam logo ki laanath hai
jis mein ye hamesha rahenge, na un se azaab halka kiya jayega aur na unhe dheel di jayegi
tum sab ka maboodh ek hee maboodh hai, us ke siva koyi maboodh barhaq nahi, wo bahuth rahem karne waala aur bada meherbaan hai
